org.gearvrf.script.javascript.util

Class ScriptEnginePool

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gearvrf.script.javascript.util.ScriptEnginePool

  • public class ScriptEnginePool
extends java.lang.Object
    Simple pool of script engines with configurable size and ScriptEngine type. Used by HttpScriptServlets to prevent concurrent executions of scripts on multiple threads.
